author: TheMaster
releaseNotes: Improved Drop Out detection and bat fixes. Logging upgrade,timming change in presence events.debug logs auto off fixed

drivers.name: Utilitech Water Sensor
drivers.description: Improved Everspring/Utilitech Water Sensor with presence and better drop out detection,battery support,and settings, Support to stop the device from drooping off with dead batteries by providing presence and dead bat detection.with info debug and trace logs
